Veins.name: vnlaNetherQuartzVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.name: ncoreLapisVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Veins.name: ncoreDiamondVeins
Veins.Description: Tiny motherlode, mostly stone, but has some diamond ore.

Veins.name: ncoreEmeraldVeins
Veins.Description: Very small, rare motherlodes with no veins.

Veins.name: abysIronGeode
Veins.Description: Large geodes of abyssal stone filled with air. An inside layer has a high rate of spawning tin, iron, copper, nitre, and gold ore.

Veins.name: abysIronLavaGeode
Veins.Description: Large geodes of abyssal stone filled with air. An inside layer has a high rate of spawning tin, iron, copper, nitre, and gold ore.

Veins.name: abysTinGeode
Veins.Description: Large geodes of abyssal stone filled with air. An inside layer has a high rate of spawning tin, iron, copper, nitre, and gold ore.

Veins.name: abysTinQuickGeode
Veins.Description: Large geodes of abyssal stone filled with air. An inside layer has a high rate of spawning tin, iron, copper, nitre, and gold ore.

Veins.name: baseNickelGeode
Veins.Description: Large geodes of ferrocalcite filled with air. An inside layer has a high rate of spawning ores.

Veins.name: nmetZincVeins
Veins.Description: Small motherlodes with 2-4 short, thick branches.

Veins.name: nmetZincVeins
Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.name: vaniNetherRedstoneVeins
Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.name: deepNetherResonatingVeins
Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.
